      Heehee - there was a mockingbird nest somewhere=
 in the vicinity. Mockingbirds, when nesting, sing 24 hours a day. This one=
 was going all night in true mockingbird fashion.
=A0
There wouldn't have b=
een any heating or cooling fans, night watchmen, sump or plumbing system so=
unds as there were none where I was the other night. Everything else plus t=
he coyotes and car traffic came through on pocket audio recorders. Plus the=
 speedway a couple miles down the road between about 7:30 and 10:30 pm. THA=
T was the worst! VRROOOM!=A0 VRROOOM!

Some that come to mind are cats, mice, structural=

I am cu=
rious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten an=
y EVP in real time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Esta=
tes, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in=
 the three halls of the building. The video for all=A0was being monitored a=
nd recorded=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at t=
he camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might ha=
ve heard if we did?

=A0
Zack
